OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD RAPE AND SEXUAL ABUSE COUNSELLING SERVICE (SRASACS)

Desc.entry: A service run by women for women. Offers a professional, free and confidential face to face counselling service, in a safe and friendly environment for women and girls aged 13 years and over, who have experienced sexual abuse and/or rape at any time in their lives. Offers on-line support to women whether they attend the service or not. When this is not staffed women can leave a message on the 24 hour answer machine Tel 0114 244 7936 and calls are returned as soon as possible. Offers immediate crisis counselling (if appropriate). Also provides in-house training and occasionally provides training for other groups/organisations. A registered charity. Self referral. SRASACS is a registered charity.

Pubs.entry: Annual Report; Leaflets, including leaflets for family and friends

Telephone.entry: Telephone Helpline Support, Tues 2-8pm, Thurs 6-8pm, and 24h answerphone
